lead_paragraph: The 14-year-old boy was charged with shooting another teenager in the face while they were playing with a gun at a friend’s house.

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Teenager Is Charged in Fatal Shooting While Playing
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Teenager Is Charged in Fatal Shooting While Playing

snippet: The 14-year-old boy was charged with shooting another teenager in the face while they were playing with a gun at a friend’s house.
abstract: Mount Pleasant, Pa, 14-year-old boy is charged as an adult with criminal homicide and illegal possession of a firearm by a minor after fatally shooting 13-year-old James Gustafson; investigation to determine owner of gun and motive continues.
